name: Bacon Race (GameJam project)
description:
[Made in a Game Jam at Falmouth University in March 2019]

In march of 2019, I had the oppertuinity to work in Falmouth university and had the great chance to participate in a team of 6 people to work on a chosen theme. After discussion and debate, the theme was given, which was "Bacon". Our team decided that in our game, an excited David Cameron would chase a pig named "Brexit". I was a lead programmer and worked closely with the main programmer Hayley. Everything you see was made within the space of about 15 hours over the course of 3 days, most of that time we faced technical diffuculties and had no internet connection. 

  This is a purely satirical game, play if you want to because you have a choice, poor Brexit did not. 

  Credits: 

– Programmer: Matthew Roberts (Twitter: @MattRobertsCGD) 
– Programmer: Hayley Davies (Twitter: @cdgamedev)

– Animator: Bartosz Kościółek (Twitter: @B_Kosciolek)
